          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Hubert és Jan van Eyck: A genti oltár, 1432 előtt, Szent Bavo -székesegyház, Gent, 350x236 cm, olaj, tábla.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Hubert and Jan van Eyck: The Ghent Altarpiece, Before 1432, Saint Bavo -Cathedral, Gent, 350x236 cm, oil, board.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hubert und Jan. van Eyck: Das Gent 
Altarpiece, vor 1432, Heiliger Bavo - Kathedrale, Herr, 350x236 
Zentimeter, Öl, Brett.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hubert et janv. van Eyck : Gand Altarpiece,
avant 1432, Saint Bavo - cathédrale, monsieur, 350x236 centimètre, 
huile, panneau.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hubert e janeiro camionete Eyck: O Ghent 
Altarpiece, antes de 1432, Saint Bavo - catedral, gent, 350x236 cm, 
óleo, placa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hubert e gennaio van Eyck: Gand Altarpiece,
prima di 1432, San Bavo - cattedrale, gent, 350x236 centimetro, olio, 
bordo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Χuψερτ και βαν του Ιαν. Eyck: Η Γάνδη 
Altarpiece, πριν από 1432, Αγιος Bavo - καθεδρικός ναός, 
Gent, 350x236 εκατ., πετρέλαιο, πίνακας.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hubert y enero van Eyck: La Gante 
Altarpiece, antes de 1432, Santo Bavo - catedral, gent, 350x236 
centímetro, aceite, tarjeta.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
